flawed_nl_solution:
At first Jeff paid, $300/month x 12 months = $<<300*12=3060>>3060/year
He paid $3060/year x 3 years = $9180 the firsts 3 years.
The final 2 years he paid $350/month x 12 months = $<<350*12=4200>>4200/year
He paid $4200/year x 2 years = $<<4200*2=8400>>8400 the last 2 years.
He paid the owner $9180 + $8400 = $<<9180+8400=17580>>17580 in total.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 3060. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
